notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of text.

Preface (p. 3-36 at beginning), signed "Cotton Mather," has caption title: "The Epistle", and same running title through p. 10. Running title thereafter to end of book, including S. Lee's sermon: Preparatory meditations upon the Day of Judgment.
Samuel Lee's sermon, p. 3-58 in second numbering, has special t.p. with title: A summons or warning to the great Day of Judgment.
"An appendix, containing only some heads of meditation ... more largely and fully delivered in a sermon preached at Charlestown ..." p. 49- 58.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
